Sentencas: The utilization of syngas as the fuel of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is one of the main ways to use the coal efficiently and cleanly.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, the possibility of carbon formation in Ni/YSZ anode may reduce the performance of SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: According to the fully three-dimensional models of chemical/electrochemical, heat/mass transfer and overpotential, the effects of fuel components on the performance and carbon formation of SOFC were obtained.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The results shows that the increments of water steam and carbon dioxide may inhibit the carbon formation activity.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, the massive water steam and carbon dioxide will reduce the output voltage of SOFC as well.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The high molar fraction of hydrogen in syngas also reduces the carbon formation activity.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The addition of carbon monoxide may narrow down the region of carbon formation, but enhance the carbon formation activity near the fuel inlet of SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the existence of methane results in the sharply carbon formation, thus, the methane should be removed as clear as possibly in syngas.
Titulo: Effects of Syngas Components on the Carbon Formation in Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
